sys_admin.name: System Administrator
sys_admin.description: Has full privileges over the entire system.

personnel_manager.name: Personnel Manager
personnel_manager.description: Can manage, add, and remove company users.

can_transfer_company_to_same_company_use.name: Company to same-company user transfer
can_transfer_company_to_same_company_use.description: Can transfer from the company account to a user in the same company.

can_transfer_company_to_other_company_us.name: Company to other-company user transfer
can_transfer_company_to_other_company_us.description: Can transfer from the company account to a user in another company.

can_transfer_company_to_other_company.name: Company to company transfer
can_transfer_company_to_other_company.description: Can transfer from the company account to another company.

can_transfer_user_to_same_company_user.name: User to same-company user transfer
can_transfer_user_to_same_company_user.description: Can transfer from the user account to another user in the same company.

can_transfer_user_to_other_company_user.name: User to other-company user transfer
can_transfer_user_to_other_company_user.description: Can transfer from the user account to a user in another company.

can_transfer_user_to_own_company.name: User to own company transfer
can_transfer_user_to_own_company.description: Can transfer from the user account to their own company.

can_transfer_user_to_other_company.name: User to other company transfer
can_transfer_user_to_other_company.description: Can transfer from the user account to another company.

can_transfer_user_to_external.name: User to external transfer
can_transfer_user_to_external.description: Can transfer from the user account to an external recipient.

can_transfer_company_to_external.name: Company to external transfer
can_transfer_company_to_external.description: Can transfer from the company account to an external recipient.

can_receive_external_to_user.name: Receive external to user
can_receive_external_to_user.description: Can receive transfers from external sources to a user account.

can_receive_external_to_company.name: Receive external to company
can_receive_external_to_company.description: Can receive transfers from external sources to a company account.

readUser.noPermissions: No permissions found for the user
readUser.noPermissionsForCompany: No permissions found for this company
readUser.error: An error occurred while retrieving user permissions

canCreateCompany.canCreate: User can create a new company
canCreateCompany.cannotCreate: User has reached the company creation limit
canCreateCompany.error: Error while checking the right to create a company

canSearchUsers.userIdAndCompanyIdRequired: User ID and Company ID are required
canSearchUsers.canSearchCompanyOnly: Can search users within the company only
canSearchUsers.error: Error while checking user search permission

canAccessSettings.userIdAndCompanyIdRequired: User ID and Company ID are required
canAccessSettings.cannotAccess: You do not have permission to access the settings page
canAccessSettings.error: Error while checking access to the settings page
